subject: Exploring the 2017 Audi A3
body:
Hi there,

Thank you for your interest in the 2017 Audi A3! This model is known for its luxurious interior and impressive fuel efficiency, making it a fantastic choice for both comfort and performance. At Mission Viejo Kia, we take pride in being a community-driven dealership with no addendums or dealer markups, ensuring a transparent and fair buying experience.

We’re here to help you every step of the way! If you have any specific questions about the Audi A3 or if there are particular features you’re looking for, please let us know. Jacob Amezola will be happy to assist you and provide any information you need.

Please let us know a convenient time for you, or you can instantly reserve your time here: <{LegacySalesApptSchLink}>


Patti
Mission Viejo Kia
24041 El Toro Rd, Lake Forest, CA 92630
